PURCHASE CONFIRMATION

Ticket type: ${object.event_ticket_id.name}

Hello ${object.name},

Thank you for your purchase!

Below you can find your Mindtrek 2016 Conference Pass. Please print out this page and be sure to bring it with you to the conference. Registration opens at 8:30 on each conference day.

Remember that with your pass you will have full access to all the events and presentations at Mindtrek, apart from a few closed sessions. Closed sessions are marked separately in the program. For full program details, please go to www.mindtrek.org/2016/program.

Mindtrek 2016 takes place October 17­-19 at Tampere Hall - ­Congress and Concert Centre. The address is: Yliopistonkatu 55, 33100 Tampere, Finland. If you have any questions, please contact info@mindtrek.org.

See you at the conference!

Best regards,
Mindtrek Team / COSS ry
